name: Stronger Together (Yoav R)
description:
This is a multiplayer game where 

One of the players has a fire gun and the other one has an acid gun.

Each one does some damage to the enemies. But if you combine the acid and the fire it will cause an explosion which does a lot of damage to the enemies, so they are stronger together.

Credits:

Gun: "Flame Thrower (Team Fortress 2)" (https://skfb.ly/6zBQX) by arminalcapon is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/).

The multiplayer was made using Photon Pun 2.
